name: Walker's Wish
description:
A young Californian travels to New England to begin his first year at a small college in rural Maine. However, upon arrival, our hero experiences a severe amount of culture shock and discovers that in order to survive the year, he will have to learn how to tolerate the people around him in this comedic, and ultimately tragic, satire of the state of New England colleges.

Run Time: Roughly 2 hours

Note: I've tested this game pretty thoroughly, but if you do come across an error, feel free to shoot me an email at bidmasters911@gmail.com

Install instructions

For Windows:

1. Download ZIP file

2. Extract to any folder

3. Run "Walker's Wish.exe"

For Mac:

1. Download and Install WINE:http://winebottler.kronenberg.org/

2. Follow Windows instructions one and two

3. Run "Walker's Wish.exe" in Wine
